Text: WelcomeDear john Welcome to Epsoncom Whether you registered to receive information about new products are looking for the latest in digital imaging solutions or want to receive special offers from Epson youll find a wealth of items and ideas on our site that will fit your needs Your Epson online account username is your email address If you ever need to change your account information just click on My Account while on the Epsoncom web site If you prefer you can call us tollfree at between am and pm Pacific Time Monday through Friday to update your account If youve purchased anything from the Epson Store your online account will automatically and securely store your ordering information so your next purchase can be made with just a few mouse clicks You can also view your order history and even track your shipments at our site We want to emphasize that in accordance with our privacy policy we will not rent sell or share any personal information youve entrusted to us with third parties We appreciate your interest in our products and look forward to serving you in the very near future Sincerely Customer Service
